title: Orphan on my doorstep
description: Twenty-nine year old Amy Gardner, although running a high fever, is on her way to see the cottage she inherited. Her car stalls and she is forced to walk through a raging storm to get help. She collapses on the doorstep of a cottage, too weak to stand up. Rod Tyler is irritated that his pity party is interrupted. At thirty-three years old, his parents just told him he was adopted. He finally goes to the door to see what the fierce wind is blowing against the door. He finds a sick woman and knows he has to help her. Amy gets a big surprise coming when she sees the cottage she inherited.
author: Margot Rising
